name: Warrior Complete Armor
description: The Warrior Larp Armor is a full suit of armor that is battle ready and adjusts to fit almost anyone. This fully functional Larp armor makes you want to participate in Larp battles and can be assembled in a variety of ways. Our steel Warrior Armor will provide the protection needed and is the preferred suit of battle ready armor for the typical fighter or...

name: Complete Armor Black Ice Heavy Deal
description: The black ice Armor comes from a collection designed for the order of good to repel the forces of evil in the multiverse. This complete fantasy armour was created with one sole purpose, to make evil leave this realm forever.  This set comes complete with arms, legs, chest and back as well as the tabard and belt. Hemet not included!

name: Dark Drake Complete Armor
description: The Dark Drake armor is a full plate armor made for knights entering into Larp battle. Forged by hand in our armory, this beautiful suit of armor is fully adjustable and made to be worn as safe armor during combat. Become the dark knight or evil warrior and remain fully protected with this fantastic armor package.

name: Ratio Ligth Deal
description: The Ratio Light Deal is a great basic costume for the light infantry. This eye catching deal is comprised of a semi-padded tunic and a helmet.  The visor on the helmet can be worn open or closed changing the overall look of the piece.

name: Complete Gothic Armor
description: Our gothic armor resembles those worn during historic medieval battles.  Forged by hand this epic fantasy armor was created with larping in mind. This set comes complete with full arms, full legs, chest, back and tassets. It is the ideal armour for the experienced gothic warrior.

name: Mercenary Armor, Brown
description: The Brown Mercenary Larp Armor is an ideal Larp armor beginner package which allows for a recently initiated warrior to purchase a cost effective armor.  This simple body armor provides impressive mobility and protection supplying precisely enough protection while in battle. This Larp armor may be adjusted to easily fit nearly every warrior making it an...

name: Mercenary Armor, Black
description: The Black Mercenary Larp Armor is a perfect larp armor starter kit that allows for a newly initiated knight to own an efficient armor at a low cost. This basic armor has great flexibility and protection providing just enough coverage during combat. This fantasy armor can be adjusted to fit most anyone and is an excellent choice for any warrior.

name: Complete Templar of Negation Armor
description: The conquest Templar of negation complete armor set is an epic armor and is a very impressive fantasy armor to wear.  This large fantastic armor comes in an epic metal finish, giving it a rugged antique look.  This complete set  is made in one size only,  let your imagination come to life and feel invincible when wearing it.

name: Ratio Armor Medium Deal
description: Even the light infantry men Of the Ratio Army need minimal protection during battle. This fantasy armor package combines top quality leather and 18 gauge steel with an antique brass finish.  This Ratio armor package has a highly detailed, Asian inspired look that will keep you light footed and ready to sack the city walls.

name: Ratio Complet Armor
description: The Ratio Armor is fantastically detailed, rich in color and top grain leather and antique gold overtones. Made from a combination of leather and 18 gauge steel this scale mail armor provides the proper protection needed during any Larp and is as strikingly beautiful as it is functional.

name: Black Ice Medium deal
description: The Black Ice Medium Deal is a great starter armor kit which offers protection where needed. Not every warrior could afford the complete paladin, or full plate armor, and really if you are that good a warrior why would you need bulky armor to weigh down. Be part of the adventure without the hassle.

name: Undead Light Armor
description: The Undead Light Deal is a started armor kit for the newly initiated in the dark arts. Not every dark warrior is allowed to wear his armor, one must gain the right and ascended in the ranks before full plate is allowed. Being light is sometimes worth it. Allowing you to gain in speed and dexterity and to be unencumbered in battle does sometimes have its...

name: Undead Medium Armor
description: The Undead Medium Deal will start to put fear in the eyes of your adversaries. This Armor deal puts armor in the right places, giving the wearer a comfortable fit as well as protecting you enough for combat. Used with a tower shield you will find that all the right parts are protected, making you ready for battle!

name: Black Ice Light Deal
description: The Black Ice Light Deal is perfect for the warrior embarking on his first adventure.  Offering minimal protection but a maximum look, this set surely stands out in the crowd.

name: Roman Legion Armor
description: The Roman Legion Larp Armor is similar to a segmented lorica Larp armor which is very comfortable and flexible to wear. Because of its movable plates this fantasy armor is perfect for any warrior that requires armor with great movement and is a must have for any Roman Legionnaire.

name: Undead Heavy Deal Large
description: This Undead armor will spread fear and panic in the minds of your enemy.  The undead will rise to follow in your footsteps and the good will tremble in your presence. This set comes complete with arms, legs, chest and back as well as the tabard and belt. Helmet not included!

name: King Complete Armor
description: Made for the typical knight, this complete suit or armor adjusts to fit most any warrior ready to enter into battle. This King Armor has a unique hand forged raised cross pattern symbolic of the heraldry of old. Our metal Warrior Body armor can provide the defense you need as well as being the most desired suit of combat ready armor for the traditional...

name: Warrior Complete Armor, Dark
description: The Dark Warrior Armor is a fully functional full suit of armor that is ready to wear and is fully adjustable. This dark full plate armor allows you to quickly and safely enter into Larp battle allowing you to customize the style you want. Made from mild steel, this complete Larp armor provides full protection and is characteristic of any dark knight.

name: Orc Rust Armor Deal
description: The orc armor deal is exceptional in every way.  This distressed armor was designer for larping and has rolled edges that protects weapons and others from real harm. This fantasy armor can be worn by any fighter or creature and has a battle worn look.
